fault.message: Java is running very low on heap space memory.

condition.message: Running very low on heap space memory in Java.

cause.message: Java garbage collection is not able to reclaim enough memory.

resolution.message: 1) Ensure that the CLOUD_OPTS variable set in eucalyptus.conf includes a value for -Xmx. Set or increase this value as necessary: by default, it should be at least 1GB or 1/4 of the physical memory, whichever is smaller. This value can be expressed in bytes, or as '1G'. 2) Restart the cloud application. 3) If this condition continues despite a high value for -Xmx, it may be necessary to add more physical memory to the machine.
